text: Maurane (born Claudine Luypaerts; 12 November 1960 – 7 May 2018) was a Belgian French language singer and actress. She was born in Ixelles, Belgium. In 2012, she became a member of the Jury in Nouvelle Star broadcast on television station D8. She was known for her 2002 single "Tu es mon autre". She also starred in the 2010 movie My Afternoons with Margueritte. Maurane died in Schaerbeek, Belgian on 7 May 2018 of suspected cardiac arrest at the age of 57.La chanteuse Maurane est décédée ==Honours== * 2001 Knight of the Ordre des Arts et Lettres (France)Article in "La Libre Belgique" * 2003 Knight of the Order of the Crown (Belgium)Culture Ministry of the French-speaking Community of Belgium, promotion 2003 * 2011 Officer of the Ordre des Arts et Lettres (France)Website RTL Belgium, Maurane, Officer ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official website Category:1960 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian singers
title: Maurane
